title: Interactive student work 1992/1993 (MAC)
brief_description: Shows interactive work from the students of Swinburne University of Technology in Melbourne. Contains: Idea>on! - Troy Innocent 1992, Innocence of facts - Domonic O’Brien 1992, The Regent - Tim Ryan 1992, On Beat Kit - amos Winikoff 1992, Haiku Dada - Felix Hude 1993, The Fridge - Ruth Luxford 1993, Gallery 1993 - group production 1993. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Macintosh computer, system 7.0 or greater. Quicktime 1.5 or greater. Memory: minimum of 10 Mbytes of RAM. Monitor: standard colour 13 inch screen.
